content:
# I have successfully harvested 10 units of stone, bringing my inventory to 10 stone, 10 iron ore, 1 wooden chest, and 10 wood.

# Now that I have enough stones, I can proceed to craft a stone furnace.

# 1. Craft the stone furnace.
craft_item(Prototype.StoneFurnace)  # Crafting 1 stone furnace.
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")
